      • combinations

        private java.lang.Double combinations(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> arr,
                                      int len,
                                      int startPosition,
                                      java.lang.Double[] result,
                                      char sign,
                                      java.lang.Double calculatedResult)
        Make a copy of the array in a tab and make all the possibilities without repetitions. Also return the result of each line of the equation
        Parameters:
        arr - Array of double to process
        len - number of number for the product
        startPosition - Where was the process
        result - the copy in a table of the combination of the numbers
        sign - the sign used to add numbers
        calculatedResult - the calculated result
        Returns:
        the result processed
